Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide #4 (coding seq: rtemp_4.3_210, peptide 1; natural AMPs; frogs, amphibians, animals; XXA; UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: the European common frog,Rana temporaria, Europe

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 47.4% similarity toTemporin 1ARa. GRAVY: 1.175; Mol Wt: 1730.135; Mol formula: C83H136N22O18.Activity: Active against S. aureus (MIC 4 uM) and E-coli (MIC >64 uM) evaluated using microdilution assay in MH medium.Toxicity:  at 100 uM, over 80% monocytes survived (MTT assays).  Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Roncevic T, Gerdol M, Spazzali F, Florian F, Mekinic S, Tossi A, Pallavicini A.2018
Literature Information.Title: Parallel identification of novel antimicrobial peptide sequences from multiple anuran species by targeted DNA sequencing.
